CustomProfile.Description: Aquapazza: Aquaplus Dream Match is a 2011 2D fighting game co‑developed by Examu and Aquaplus. It brings together characters from visual novels such as Utawarerumono, Tears to Tiara and To Heart in a crossover ‘dream match’. Featuring 26 fighters and partners, it uses an Active Emotion System and Splash Arts to reward momentum, and partner‑assists to extend combos. Anime‑style visuals and a balanced roster make it approachable for fighting game fans.
